item.title: How to quickly insert a figure in LyX
item.description: I will show one of the user-defined commands that I use in Lyx, a \(\LaTeX\) frontend, to quickly insert figures with captions.

item.title: Need for software testing
item.description: This post discusses how lack of tests can make it difficult to progress in a software project. This happens as at later stages it can become difficult to use components developed earlier if these components are unreliable.
